description:
Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to change a 1 Bed (2 Person) consented residential unit to a 3 Bed (6 Person) residential unit at the penthouse level of Block A, in pursuant to planning permission reference 192597OPDFUL dated 09/12/2020 for'' Construction of an additional 10 storeys on Block A comprising 73 flats (44 x 1 bed and 29 x 2 bed); 4 storeys on Block Comprising 24 flats (24 x 1 bed); provision of a minimum 35% of the total number of additional habitable rooms as
affordable housing in Block B, and associated changes to the basement and ground floor levels to provide additional cycle storage and minor changes to the approved landscaping layout (resulting in 97 additional flats overall, bringing the total number on-site up to 701 (comprising 426 x 1 bed, 242 x 2 bed and 33 x 3 bed)''
(Out of Borough Consultation for the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham)
